name: Kennisinstituut Duurzaam Verpakken
goal:
The Netherlands Institute for Sustainable Packaging (in Dutch: Kennisinstituut Duurzaam Verpakken/KIDV) advises and inspires companies with tailor-made advice about sustainable packaging. We offer entrepreneurs factual knowledge and practical tools, based on applied scientific research, current trends and knowledge of the packaging chain.
The KIDV was set up by the party-groups that agreed on the Packaging Framework: the Dutch Ministry of Infrastructure and Environment (IenM), the producers and importers of packed goods (packers/fillers) and the Dutch municipalities.
euInitiatives:
Packaging and packaging waste,
new strategy on plastic,
biobased packaging
design for recycling
